my_favourite_bni_story: Last month I spoke to an unknown prospect residing at Trichy. I explained the policy details to him through phone. But he got satisfied and asked me to come directly to explain, he feels its better to understand for their family members. From Coimbatore to Trichy travelling hours around 5. This is a very competitive profession, if a local agent at trichy means there is chance that he takes that business. I am also not good at traveling. At that time I approached our chapter Support Director Mrs.Bhuvana Manogaran to ask help from BNI Trichy members. She asked to search in BNI connect app to reach people. I got member details named Mr.Chokkalingam and called him for support. Unbelievable.... I called him and introduced myself, immediately he asked “What can I do for you?”. I was surprised, feeling very happy and confident. I explained my requirement. Without hesitating, whole heartedly he attended my prospect on time and supported me. My prospect also feels happy and contacts me to express his satisfaction. Two days later Mr.Chokkalingam visited Coimbatore and we had 121. He gave a lot of inputs regarding business. Great person, with great heart and thoughts. These all happened because of BNI only. Now whenever any prospect asks, being a coimbatorian how you help me if I need support. I proudly convey them “Sir I am a BNI member, I can support you anywhere around world”
